FuncDef: This command indicates the location ID for ATM OAM.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the 16 octets that identifies the system loopback location ID as required by the ATM OAM Loopback capability. This textual convention is defined in ITU-T standard I.610. The loopback location ID should be entered in the following format: xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx.
